response.summary:
Systems and computer engineer from the National University of Colombia.

As a software developer I have acquired knowledge in different areas such as: 
- VueJs. 
- Azure DevOps to implement agile methodologies. 
- Knowledge in NodeJs. 
- Linux. 
- Python applied to artificial intelligence. 
- Flutter. 
- Git.

About me: 
- Always willing to acquire new knowledge in different technologies. 
- I seek to adapt my knowledge to the needs of the team.
response.skills: Git, PHP, Ingeniería, Desarrollo web, JavaScript, Vue.js, Blockchain, Microsoft Azure, Azure DevOps, Continuous Delivery, Administración de servidores, Unix, CLI, Linux, Bash, React.js, Web Interface Design, Full-Stack Development, React Hooks, Next.js

profile_positions.description:
Application of Scrum agile methodologies to be implemented in internal projects with clients, using platforms such as Azure DevOps and Git.
Development in the GDC language in the Intermediate application to make changes requested by the client.
Interact with Content Direct's internal team, external customers and vendors to gather detailed technical requirements for assigned projects.
Actively participate in product design and team-wide activities to ensure on-time project completion.
profile_positions.title: Software Dev Engr Grad

profile_positions.description:
Member of the solutions and innovation team, working mainly with:
- Development and process documentation in PHP, Javascript and Node.js for internal website.
- Development in "GDC" for CSG mediation solutions.
- Development of reports and dashboards through the Dome tool.
- Use and constant update of Azure DevOps, mainly for repository management (Git) and activities (Scrum Methodology).
- General developments and automations in Linux and Windows environments.
profile_positions.title: Intern - Solutions and innovation Group

profile_positions.description:
Help in the preparation of reports on the execution and completion of training activities.
Weekly support in reinforcement activities and accompaniment groups of students, providing tutorials on programming languages, equipment support, installation and basic management of operating systems.
profile_positions.title: Student assistant

company.name: CSG
company.description: CSG is a leader in innovative customer engagement, revenue management and payments solutions that make ordinary customer experiences extraordinary. Our cloud-first architecture and customer-obsessed mindset help companies around the world launch new digital services, expand into new markets, and create dynamic experiences that capture new customers and build brand loyalty. For over 40 years, CSG’s technologies and people have helped some of the world’s most recognizable brands solve their toughest business challenges and evolve to meet the demands of today’s digital economy with future-ready solutions that drive exceptional customer experiences. With more than 5,000 employees in over 20 countries, CSG is the trusted technology provider for leading global brands in telecommunications, retail, financial services and healthcare. Our solutions deliver real world outcomes to more than 900 customers in over 120 countries.
